'''''Age of Science''''' ([[2005 in literature|2005]]) is a book about the relationship between ''Islam and science'' in ''Age of Science'' by author and [[Egyptians|Egyptian]]-American scientist, and the winner of the 1999 [[Nobel Prize in Chemistry]] [[Ahmed Zewail]]. The book is also a biography and autobiography about Ahmed Zewail.
